content.text: The Angels were a mysterious species of winged sentients who inhabited the moons of the planet Iego. They were reputed for their beauty. When the young Anakin Skywalker first met his future wife Padmé Amidala, he compared her good looks to that of an Angel.

elements.text: Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace
Star Wars: The Clone Wars – "Mystery of a Thousand Moons"
